pr_title: Fix loading system files when loading all townblocks.

timeline.message: Fix loading system files when loading all townblocks.

timeline.bodyText: Is this still skipping reading from the deleted folders inside of the townblocks\worldname\ folders?
timeline.author: LlmDl

replies.bodyText: Yes, because the deleted folder doesn't end in .data
A whole bunch of internet services are down because of a massive DDOS.
